Basic Terms to Know:
  • RAID 10: Striping and Mirroring of 4 or more drives. Allows for failure of up to 2 drives as long as they are in different sets
  • CDP = Continous Data Protection
  • Guaranteed Memory: The amount of memory your VPS will always have full ability to use.
  • Burst Memory: The amount of memory your VPS can burst to if the server has free memory.
